scenario.dependencies: ExtTGDs: //R(A: $x, B: $y), const1(A: $y) -> S(A: $y, B: $z). R(A: $x, B: $y), $y == 3 -> S(A: $y, B: $z). //R(A: $x, B: $y), const2(A: $y, B: $z) -> S(A: $y, B: $z). R(A: $x, B: $y), $y == 5-> S(A: $y, B: 6). ExtEGDs: S(A: $y1, B: $x), S(A: $y2, B: $x), R(A: $z1, B:$y1), R(A: $z2, B:$y2) -> $y1 == $y2. S(A: $y1, B: $x), S(A: $y2, B: $x), R(A: $z1, B:$y1) and not exists(R(A: $z2, B:$y2)) -> $y1 == $y2. S(A: $y1, B: $x), S(A: $y2, B: $x) and not exists(R(A: $z1, B:$y1)) and not exists(R(A: $z2, B:$y2)) -> $y1 == $y2.
